name: Dicey Escape
description:
This is my submission to the GMTK game jam 2022, with the theme being "Roll of the dice". This is my first jam game, and I hope you like it!

Story:

In this game, you are one of the mighty warriors known as number ninjas.  You and your tribe use the power of mathematics to aid the people in need. You also have another goal: protecting the dice.

This is a powerful artifact that uses the power of randomness to nullify the exact results that derive from the number ninjas' operations.

One fateful day, a man by the name of Diceous stole the dice. You, as one of the dice's protectors, have to go after Diceous and defeat him before he starts to destroy everything.

To move forward, you'll have to quickly solve math operations, while Diceous rolls the dice and sends you back on your way.

This page includes a Windows version and a Linux version (untested) of the game. It also contains an HTML5 port, so you don't need to download anything!

Problems:

- No music :(

- The sound effects may sound weird during the game (maybe because of bad optimization idk)
